title: Lag and shutdown CPU
body: Recently, if I play between 9pm and 11pm I get la lot of lag spike. I dont know if this is my ISP problems or the sever problems, but it get me twice in my promotion and this really give me a lot of frustration. Give me and answer pls.

replies.body:
Possibly the server's fault.

Who's your ISP exactly?
My ISP is TPG, and usually it runs fine, but for early in week like Monday I get lag a lot, most was after 9 pm, before that it's fine.
Do you share your internet connection with anyone else?

No, when I play I make sure no one use the internet so that my ping doesn't get high even if i share with my cousin she use it for study so the ping was maximum is 100~120 but this is when it get to 1k~2k ping.

Well, that's what I mean. The way OSes work nowadays is that they will begin to update their drivers and perform other system maintenances when it believes the system isn't under immense strain, ala studying. It could be that your cousin's computer is updating itself when you play, hence why it's using up a lot of bandwidth.

Try playing the game for a while when you are 100% sure that no-one else is using the net. If you're still getting that 1k ping, then you know for sure that that's not the problem.
